value.title: Memory demand for AI boosts chip tester business: Advantest
value.excerpt: Japan's Advantest said it sees sales of memory testers reaching 244 billion yen ($1.65 billion) in the financial year ending March, an increase of 5 billion yen from its October outlook but down a quarter on the same period a year earlier.

value.title: Cadence brings AI supercomputing to digital twin simulations
value.excerpt: Cadence Design Systems has launched a hardware and software platform to bring supercomputing performance to digital twin and AI simulations.

value.title: WEKA’s Sustainable Data Platform For NexGen Cloud’s GPU-As-A-Service
value.excerpt: WekaIO partners with NexGen Cloud, the leading UK-based sustainable IAAS provider, to establish a high-performance foundation for NexGen Cloud's upcoming AI Supercloud.

value.title: IBM Doubles Down On Its AI Cloud
value.excerpt: IBM has doubled capacity in its Vela Cloud, part of the IBM Cloud offering, to enable its clients to refine more and larger models.

value.title: Inference.ai matches AI workloads with cloud GPU compute
value.excerpt: Inference.ai, a startup building a platform that matches AI workloads with available GPU compute, has raised new venture capital.

value.title: GenAI is moving to your smartphone, PC and car — here’s why
value.excerpt: Generative AI tools, apps and services that use the processing power on edge devices can access data locally, return faster results, and they're more secure.

value.title: Semron raises $7.9M for AI chips with 3D packaging
value.excerpt: Semron has raised $7.9 million (7.3 million euros) for AI chips with 3D packaging for mobile devices. Dresden, Germany-based Semron said its goal is to set a new standard for AI chips in mobile devices, addressing the evolving needs of the industry.

value.title: Heads of chip giants Nvidia, TSMC meet in Taiwan as tight chip supply threatens to hinder AI boom
value.excerpt: Nvidia founder Jensen Huang met with TSMC founder Morris Chang and CEO C.C. Wei over dinner in Taipei to discuss chip supply.

value.title: Opinion: Intel is struggling to gain traction in AI chips while Nvidia and AMD roar ahead
value.excerpt: If this past quarter’s results offer a lot of optimism for the client side of Intel’s house, then they bring an equal amount of questions for the data-center and AI infrastructure business unit. Revenue dropped year over year by 10% and operating income was down 38%, with an operating margin of 2%.

value.title: Samsung plans to limit Galaxy AI to 2023 devices and newer, for now
value.excerpt: Samsung says Galaxy AI will be restricted to devices released in 2023 and later, for now. It appears that hardware limitations are not the reason why the software won’t run on devices released before 2023. Samsung avoided answering why the Galaxy S23 FE will get Galaxy AI but not the Galaxy S22 series.

value.title: Memory Chip Giant SK Hynix Returns To Profit On Strong AI Demand
value.excerpt: The world's second-largest memory chip maker, South Korea's SK Hynix, said on Thursday it had returned to profit after four consecutive quarters of losses driven by demand for chips used in artificial intelligence.

value.title: AMD launches Radeon RX 7600 XT GPU with Fluid Motion Frames Technology
value.excerpt: AMD compares the performance of the Radeon RX 7600 XT GPU with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 and claims to offer 1.9x faster gaming and raytracing performance. The graphics card does support all the latest Radeon software technologies such as AMD Fluid Motion Frames (AFMF), which generates additional frames to make the game look smoother.

value.title: SK Hynix swings to fourth-quarter profit on strong AI chip demand
value.excerpt: The world's second-biggest memory chipmaker reported a 346 billion won ($259.77 million) operating profit for the October-December quarter.

value.title: After Gen AI’s 82% Stock Surge In 2023, Three Keys To Profiting From Davos Takeaways
value.excerpt: If Generative AI stocks grow faster than investors expect, their shares will rise. A case in point is ASML — the Dutch provider of a critical machine for manufacturing the chips used to train large language models. In 2023, ASML’s stock rose 36%.

value.title: Apple aims to run AI models directly on iPhones, other devices
value.excerpt: Chief executive Tim Cook told analysts last summer that it “has been doing research across a wide range of AI technologies” and investing and innovating “responsibly” when it comes to the new technology.
